page.title: 07COMMUNITY NEEDS
page.content:
One of the main problems in our area is the lack of parking facilities. We have only two main car parks, both behind our two supermarkets.In our shopping area many streets have double yellows lines,this prohibits much useful parking area.
The main street,Barnsley Road,is extremely busy.It is so hazardous that three pedestrian crossings are required within a distance of 300m.
Many shops have no rear access, hence deliveries have to be made on the main street.
If our area is to keep abreast with the demands of today's shopping public, deep consideration must be given to a more stream-lined parking system.
